charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1101_0100_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
a mountain trail, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] felt enormous tremors
coming from the ground!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_0500_: It might cause a rockslide! Watch out!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_0600_:
I guess if we keep this up, we might cause some
problems for these people. Should we continue
this another day?
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_0800_:
Although it’s a bit of a shame that this wasn’t an
official match.
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_0900_:
While I’m here on Pasio, I’d love to have a battle
with you in front of a proper audience!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_1000_: Yeah, I look forward to that!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_0401_1200_:
So you saw us, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
How’d you like our battle?
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_0402_1400_:
Looks like our heated battle got your attention,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_1500_:
It really is a shame that we had to stop before we
could finish that battle. I was having a lot of fun!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_1600_:
I don’t get many opportunities to battle Trainers
from places other than Galar, so it’s great to
battle someone new!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_1700_:
I never thought following Charizard after getting
lost would lead me to a battle with such a strong
sync pair!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_1800_:
Pasio is the perfect place to test my strength
against Trainers from other regions!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_1900_:
I’d love to battle more Champions from all the
other regions!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_0301_2000_: I wanna see those battles, too!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_0401_2200_:
But actually, wouldn’t you rather battle than be
a spectator?
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_0402_2400_: That’s what I like to hear! Let’s do it!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_2500_: Let’s have a battle here and now!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_2600_:
What’s wrong, Charizard? You don’t look
too happy.
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_2700_: Maybe you’re trying to say this isn’t the time?
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_2800_:
That makes sense. A battle with
[Name:PlayerNickname ] should also be a
proper one, in the right venue.
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_2900_:
Looks like Charizard can tell how strong
you are.
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_3000_:
It’s all thanks to Charizard that I got to battle
Steven, after all!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_3100_:
I guess that as Champion, I shouldn’t have my
partner Pokémon do everything for me.
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_3200_: I have to work on improving myself, too!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_3300_:
Let’s see... I know! I could start by finding
opponents for us to battle on my own!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_3400_: OK! First, let’s head out to those woods over there!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_0401_3600_: Oh... Did I mix up my directions again?
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_3900_:
Ahahaha! Sorry! Looks like I’ll have to rely on you
a bit more, Charizard! Otherwise, I don’t think I’ll
get anywhere!
charaepi_ch0247_00_dande/2301_1201_4000_:
Thanks for pointing me the right way! You can
join me, if you like!
